review_data.title: Great food & service
review_data.content: Very good pizzas and pastas at a reasonable price. The staff is very polite and the service is fast. They even open the frontdoor when you leave the restaurant!

review_data.title: Stroke of Luck
review_data.content: Our family group were staying overnight in Zurich and were looking for a restaurant in the area of The Hotel Bristol where we were staying and chanced upon Pizza Pasta Ciao on Google . How fortunate we were the ambiance was good the moment we...More
